document.heading: District of Columbia Election Code of 1955

history.narrative: Law 4-88, the “District of Columbia Election Code of 1955,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-271, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 24, 1981 and December 8, 1981, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 20, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-142 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
